with heavy cloud cover, lightning accompanied by the deep rumbling of thunder occasionally lancing through the clouds as a persistent downpour drenches the ground. \} \\ \{ The starlit sky overhead is shifts gradually into a gentle breeze, fresh with the scent of rain. \} \\ \{ The night sky is partly clouded over, allowing only scant glimpses of the stars above. \| A cool breeze, richly scented with autumnal aromas, gently skates the clouds over the sky as it moves through the area. \| Clouds cover the sky but skate rapidly by on the breeze, allowing peeks of the starlight beyond. \| A breeze scented by wood smoke and autumn leaves gently brushes your cheek. \| A soft breeze skates an errant autumn leaf over the ground. \| Starlight peeks through the partly cloudy skies above. \| The night air is chilly and damp. \| A swirl of breeze-born leaves drifts over the ground in the distance. \| The air is scented with warmth aromas of fall. \| Light cloud cover coasts slowly through the sky overhead. \} \\ \{ Snow falls, persistent and heavy, from the heavily clouded skies above. \| A cold, gusty wind creates drifting, undulating patterns over the new-fallen snow. \} \\ \} \{ \\ \{ The sky above appears to be gradually clearing of cloud cover, glimpses of the stars filtering between the cloud-wisps as they skate by with the cool breeze. \} \\\{ The clouds above appear to be slowly disappearing, a refreshingly damp, cool breeze pushing them out of sight. \} \\ \{ The air is cool and damp, light rain occasionally falling from the cloudy sky above. \| A chilly rain gently patters down from above. \| The breeze is cold and damp with the light rain showers. \| Autumnal aromas born on the damp breeze smell of wet leaves and wood smoke. \| The rain gently falls from above, pattering softly on the ground. \| The rain falling from the sky is chilly, the light breeze adding to the cold. \| The stars above are hidden from view by the rain clouds in the sky. \| The rain briefly intensifies, falling heavier before slackening once more into a gentle shower. \| The rain briefly lessens into a misty drizzle before becoming rain droplets once more. \| The misty sky briefly opens up, allowing a scant and fleeting view of starlight before clouds close in once more. \| The chilly breeze smells of rain and wet autumn leaves as the rain waxes and wanes. \} \\ \{ A light snow continues to fall as the cloud cover blocking out the sky above slowly begins to dissipate with the cold, wintry wind. \} \\ \}
